name: Parcy's Parcels
description:
Parcy’s Parcels is a “Warioware'' and “Catch You Letter” inspired game that follows the cute little mouse mailman Parcy’s day.  It is  a series of mini-games, where Parcy go through his route to deliver mail to various animals.

Controls

AH A DOG

Collect all your dropped mail before getting tackled by the dog!

Use WASD to move around and avoid the dog!

Drop the mail into the mailbox before the time runs out!

NOT THE SPRINKLERS

Run down the path using the A and D keys while avoiding the sprinklers!

Hold W to pull out your umbrella!

PLEASE FIT!

Fit all the mail into the mailbox before the time runs ou!

Left Click and Drag each parcel onto the mailbox.

Right Click and Hold the parcel.

Credits

made using Unity, Procreate, Photoshop, Jummbox
